scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd src/lib && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../components && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd src/lib && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ../components && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd src/lib && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ../components && npm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.preinstall: echo '*** Be sure to use 'yarn install-all' not 'yarn install' ***!'
scripts.install-all: yarn install && node get-words.cjs && cd src/lib && yarn install && cd ../components && yarn install
scripts.build-components: rm -rf src/components/dist && tsc --project src/components/tsconfig.json && cd src/components && node post-build.cjs
